mapper.select: SELECT uid, upw, uemail, uname, upnb, ugrd, ugender, wdate FROM user_buyer ORDER BY wdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_buyer (uid, upw, uemail, uname, upnb, ugender) VALUES (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{uemail}, #{uname}, #{upnb}, #{ugender})
